title: October 23–29: Election Countdown
description: Prepare for Election Day by practicing high-pressure constituent interaction, rapid-fire responses, and final strategic decision-making.

tasks.prompt: Town Hall: Respond to constituent questions on healthcare, fiscal responsibility, and ethical governance. Type or dictate your answers; AI evaluates clarity and engagement.
Rapid Q&A: Answer 3–5 short prompts quickly, demonstrating consistency and staying on message under pressure.
Endgame Strategy: Allocate remaining CC between ads, ground game, or debate preparation. Each choice affects final campaign metrics.

narrator: Final week before Election Day! Conduct town halls, rapid Q&A, and choose your endgame strategy wisely.
readingSummary: October 23–29 tests stamina, clarity, and strategic decision-making just before Election Day.
Candidates must balance rapid responses, messaging consistency, and final resource allocation.

tasksDetails.prompt: Host a timed town hall and answer constituent questions. Focus on clear, persuasive, and policy-aligned responses.
Complete rapid Q&A prompts. Demonstrate quick thinking, consistency, and message discipline.
Finalize your campaign endgame strategy by allocating CC to ads, ground game, or debate prep. Explain your choices.

sources: General Election October 23–29 – Simulator Test Mode

outcome.description: AI evaluates the quality and speed of responses. Voter approval and CC totals are updated and locked for final results. Demonstrates performance under live pressure.
